jchess.gamelogic

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • jchess.gamelogic.Game
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ITimerListener

    public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
implements ITimerListener
    This class is responsible to perform operations against any activity on Board. It is basically a manager class which with the help of other classes manages state of the board and make other necessary operations related to Board. E.g It is responsible to find possible moves and make movements. It is also keeps track of the timer.
    Since:
    7 Dec 2019
    Author:
    Sajad Karim
